channel.title: Posts on COMP6443 Musings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on COMP6443 Musings

item.title: KB Proxy
item.description: Introduction KB Proxy is a Burp extension to access local-only sites through a tunnel endpoint.

item.title: Enumeration
item.description: Enumeration Enumeration is the process of finding sites/domains/locations that may be of interest

item.title: Threat Modeling
item.description: Threat modeling is a process by which potential threats, such as structural vulnerabilities, or the absence of appropriate safeguards can be identified, enumerated, and mitigations can be prioritised
